name: Farm
uniques: Does not need removal of [Forest]
Can also be built on tiles adjacent to fresh water
[+1 Food] from [Fresh water] tiles <after discovering [Civil Service]>
[+1 Food] from [non-fresh water] tiles <after discovering [Fertilizer]>
Pillaging this improvement yields approximately [+18 Gold]

name: Fort
uniques: Can be built outside your borders
Gives a defensive bonus of [50]%

name: Grow Home
uniques: Turn this tile into a [Forest] tile
Does not need removal of [Trading post] <hidden from users>
Cannot be built on [Desert] tiles <hidden from users>
Cannot be built on [Snow] tiles <hidden from users>
